DIGEST OF  INTRODUCED B ILL
Citations Affected:  IC 5-2-6.1-1.2; IC 6-1.1-1-4.7; IC 10-14-1-3.5;
IC 12-7-2-51.3; IC 16-18-2-88.4; IC 23-14; IC 25-1; IC 25-15; IC 29-2;
IC 30-2-13; IC 35-31.5-2-72.7; IC 36-1-2.
Synopsis:  Disposition of human remains by composting. Amends the
definition of cremation to include natural organic reduction as a means
for the dissolution of human remains. Requires the state board of
funeral and cemetery service to adopt rules governing the operation of
natural organic reduction facilities. Adds natural organic reduction to
statutes that allow for burial or cremation.
Effective:  July 1, 2025.
Miller K
January 21, 2025, read first time and referred to Commi ttee on Comme rce, Small Business
and Economic Development.
